label: No Analysis
info: No specific analysis is selected. Use this option to reset or start fresh.

label: Resource Allocation
info: Analyzes how resources are assigned to tasks or roles. Helps identify over-allocated or under-utilized resources.

label: Unique Resources
info: Displays the total number of unique resources available in the system.

label: Roles per Resource
info: Shows the distribution of roles assigned to each resource. Helps identify multi-skilled resources or role overlaps.

label: Resources per Activity
info: Indicates the number of resources assigned to each activity. Useful for identifying bottlenecks or overstaffed activities.

label: Activities per Role
info: Lists the activities associated with each role. Helps understand the workload distribution across roles.

label: Case Duration
info: Focuses on the time taken to complete cases or processes. Helps identify delays or inefficiencies.

label: Duration per Role
info: Measures the average time spent by each role on activities. Helps identify roles that may be overburdened or underutilized.

label: Duration per Role and Resource
info: Normalized view of time spent by each resource within a role. Useful for comparing resource efficiency within the same role.

label: Duration per Activity
info: Tracks the time spent on each activity. Helps identify time-consuming tasks or inefficiencies.

label: Duration per Activity and Role (Heatmap)
info: Visualizes the average duration of activities by role in a heatmap format. Helps identify patterns or outliers in activity durations.

label: Duration per Activity and Resource
info: Compares the time spent by different resources on the same activity. Useful for identifying performance discrepancies.

label: Duration per Activity and Resource (Heatmap)
info: Normalized heatmap comparing resource performance across activities. Helps identify inefficiencies or training needs.

label: Workload Distribution
info: Analyzes how workloads are distributed across resources, roles, and activities. Helps ensure balanced workloads and prevent burnout.

label: Role by Resource
info: Shows how time is distributed across roles for each resource. Helps identify resources with uneven workloads.

label: Activity by Resource
info: Displays the distribution of time spent by each resource on different activities. Helps identify resource specialization or overcommitment.

label: Activity by Role
info: Illustrates the distribution of time spent by each role on different activities. Helps identify role-specific inefficiencies or bottlenecks.

label: Capacity Utilization
info: Measures how effectively resources, roles, and activities are utilized. Helps identify underutilized or overburdened areas.

label: Resource Capacity Utilization
info: Tracks the utilization rate of individual resources. Helps identify underutilized or overworked resources.

label: Role Capacity Utilization
info: Measures the utilization rate of roles. Helps identify roles that are overburdened or underutilized.

label: Activity Capacity Utilization
info: Tracks the utilization rate of activities. Helps identify activities that are underperforming or over-resourced.
